typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		registration_dttm as string,
		id as string,
		first_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		email as string,
		gender as string,
		ip_address as string,
		cc as string,
		country as string,
		birthdate as string,
		salary as integer,
		title as string,
		comments as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> employee
source(output(
		registration_dttm as string,
		id as string,
		first_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		email as string,
		gender as string,
		ip_address as string,
		cc as string,
		country as string,
		birthdate as string,
		salary as string,
		title as string,
		comments as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> dept
employee, dept join(employee@registration_dttm == dept@registration_dttm,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 filter(employee@id > '5',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Filter1
Filter1 select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveDuplicateColumns1
Sort1 select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveColumns1
RemoveColumns1 split(id < '600',
	disjoint: false) ~> SplitBy@(output1, output2)
RemoveDuplicateColumns1 derive(registration_dttm = toTimestamp(registration_dttm,'yyyy-mm-dd'),
		first_name = ltrim(first_name,'N')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sort(asc(salary, true)) ~> Sort1
SplitBy@output1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['myoutput.csv'],
	dateFormat:'MM/dd/yyyy',
	timestampFormat:'MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
SplitBy@output2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['myoutput2.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink2
